title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Learner Behavior Analysis in Remote Learning: Social Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze their discussion forum participation patterns using LMS clickstream data
Learners can interpret SNA metrics (degree centrality, betweenness centrality, etc.) to assess interaction levels with peers
Effective communication strategies can be formulated and applied based on SNA results in team-based mathematical problem-solving projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
